bug.description:
Using the web service and going to PDF I see on the browser console GET https://grobid.atypon.com/resources/pdf.js/build/pdf.js net::ERR_ABORTED 404 This is reasonable since the whole resources folder is missing root@grobid-84cbcddb44-4ns4b:/opt/grobid# ls /opt/grobid/grobid-home/ config language-detection lexicon lib models pdf2xml schemas tmp and <denchmark-code>root@grobid-84cbcddb44-4ns4b:/opt/grobid# cat grobid-home/config/grobid.properties ... ##-------------------- start: directories --------------------- # properties of where to find directories necessary for Grobid # EACH KEY REFERENCING A PATH HAS TO ENDS WITH ".path" grobid.resource.path=./resources </denchmark-code>
